long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension displays the webpage image information on mouse hover with to possibility to pin  and copy image information. You can also open any image in a new tab and download them.

Image information are:
- Image type: embedded, background, base64
- Image rendered size
- Image original size
- Image aspect ratio
- Image weight
- Image URL and download
- Image information caching


How to use it?
Install the extension and pin it (recommended for a quick access). Click on activate and make mouse hover or click on images to pin the image info. The extension is only active in a single tab, to use in several, just activate it on different tabs.
The extension has no impact on browser performance if it's not activated by using the "activate" button in the popup.

Perfect for:
✓ Web developers
✓ Designers
✓ Content creators
✓ SEO specialists
✓ Anyone working with online images

Streamline your workflow and gain valuable insights into web images effortlessly. Download Get Image Info now and transform how you interact with online visuals!
